Package imagingbook.pub.geometry.basic

Interface Point

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Corner, Pnt, Point.Imp, SiftDescriptor, Vector2D
    public interface Point
    Interface specifying the behavior of a simple 2D point. It is used to accommodate different (legacy) point implementations a common API. This file also defines a nested default implementation class which simply extends Point2D.Double.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  Point.Imp
      Simple fallback implementation of the Point interface.
